TechValidate.    Content: Elsevier Major Reference Works 2022 We all know that the primary point of interaction with scholarly literature is at the journal article but researchers also need an authoritative place to access fundamental knowledge while performing interdisciplinary research and learning about a new subject area. This is where Major Reference Works help. Major Reference Works enable researchers and students to build knowledge and confidence in new and interdisciplinary subject areas. 87% of ScienceDirect users agree they need fundamental information in their work Source: TechValidate survey of 270 users of Elsevier ScienceDirect. TechValidate. TVID: 9D4-230-2AD Elsevier Major Major Reference Works are a Reference Works 2022 long-term investment • Provide a wealth of foundational knowledge in a field The lifetime usage of Major Reference Works is greater over a longer period of time than other content types • Are trusted and peer reviewed demonstrating the enduring value of this critical • Offer interdisciplinary knowledge across a subject area foundational content. • Build fundamental knowledge and confidence in new and interdisciplinary subject areas A recent study shows 30% of Major Reference Work usage is still • Are aligned with other content types on ScienceDirect generated 10 years after publication* ensuring your researchers are making the most of your content and getting the full picture of a subject area • Are surfaced through ScienceDirect Topics, our latest enhancement which provides critical contextual *Based on Usage Analysis on ScienceDirect knowledge at a user’s point of needWe have a wide range of new Major Reference Works for 2022 covering topics from Nuclear Medicine to Energy Storage to gut Microbiota.
